editorialNotes.standard: Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesnâ€™t mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Cameraâ€™s grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. Itâ€™s not just about old-school kicks, thoughâ€”this powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
